replies.body: I'm guessing it's because Riot has changed Varus' backstory to be a gay

>
> I'm guessing it's because Riot has changed Varus' backstory to be a gay

Well thats sad...

Out of all reasons to uninstall League it's the narrative team?

Huh.

I'm waiting on them to fix this because reinstalling after the Fiora fixes was a pain in the ass. There's no point in caring about any of the champions when they can be annihilated at any moment and replaced with something much worse.
